extension.description:
Little Fox - Your clever companion for Turkish series streaming!
Professional-grade player addon with multi-provider support and smart stream selection.
Architecture: - Providers: Scrape sites (3SK, Qrmzi, Turkish123, YouTube, EgyDead) - Resolvers: Extract streams (YouTube Piped API, ResolveURL) - Core: Orchestrate providers and resolvers - Player: Kodi 21 compatible playback - ID Translator: IMDb to TMDB translation
Features: - Interactive Selection Loop - Smart server retry with blocking error dialogs - Quality-based server ranking - Multi-provider support - YouTube via Piped API (HLS streams) - Auto-translate subtitles (Turkish to English) - Kodi 21 Omega compatible - Compatible with AIO Metadata, Seren, The Crew
ID Support: - TMDB ID: Direct usage (tmdb_id=12345) - IMDb ID: Auto-translation to TMDB (imdb_id=tt1234567) - Episode IMDb: Automatically finds parent series - In-Memory Cache: Fast repeated lookups
Configuration: - Enable/disable providers individually - Configure search mode (parallel/sequential) - Adjust timeouts and concurrency - Custom TMDB API key support
Compatible with AIO Metadata, TMDb Helper, Seren, The Crew!
